text: allāhanu jīvagaḷannu avugaḷa maraṇada vēḷe vaśapaḍisikoḷḷuttāne. Mattu mr̥tavāgada jīvagaḷannū avanu, avugaḷa niddeya vēḷeyalli vaśapaḍisikoḷḷuttāne – ā paiki maraṇavu vidhisalpaṭṭiruva jīvavannu mātra avanu taḍediṭṭu koḷḷuttāne hāgū itara jīvagaḷannu ondu nirdiṣṭa avadhigāgi maraḷisuttāne. Cintisuva janarige idaralli khaṇḍita pāṭhagaḷive
